**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 137 2.0 **Usage** held in 2 hands **Bulk** L --- Sought after by many unscrupulous [bards](/Classes.aspx?ID=3), this instrument is surprisingly light and easy to carry, but also empowered with a number of spells carefully selected to help with fooling others or making a hasty retreat. While playing the mandolin, you gain a +1 item bonus to [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) and [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks. **Activate** ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Effect** You change the instrument's color and shape to one you prefer, and you can turn it into a different handheld string instrument that takes two hands to play. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You expend a number of charges from this instrument to cast a spell from its list. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Trickster's Mandolin **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 137 2.0 **Price** 90 gp **Bulk** L ---
  • **Cantrip** [_prestidigitation_](/Spells.aspx?ID=229)
  • **1st** [_illusory disguise_](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), [_item facade_](/Spells.aspx?ID=166), [_ventriloquism_](/Spells.aspx?ID=356)
Trickster's Mandolin (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 137 2.0 **Price** 460 gp **Bulk** L ---
  • **2nd** [_blur_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1455), [_illusory creature_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1567), [_illusory disguise_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1568), [invisibility](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2790)
  • **3rd** _illusory disguise_, [_phantom prison_](/Spells.aspx?ID=969), [_shared invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2025)
Trickster's Mandolin (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 137 2.0 **Price** 1,900 gp **Bulk** L --- The item bonuses are +2.
  • **4th** [_confusion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=48), _invisibility_, _illusory disguise_
  • **5th** _hallucination_, [_illusory scene_](/Spells.aspx?ID=161), _Illusory Disguise_
name: Trickster's Mandolin (Major)
